SD card was removed while still in use!
Manage WLAN, Bluetooth, airplane mode, mobile networks, & VPNs
Connect to data services when roaming
Connect to data services when roaming
"You've lost data connectivity because you left your home network with data roaming turned off."

"When you allow data roaming, you may incur significant roaming charges!
This setting affects all users on this phone."

Set My Location, screen unlock, SIM card lock, credential storage lock
Set My Location, screen unlock, credential storage lock
Require a numeric PIN or password to decrypt your phone each time you power it on

"You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. Once you encrypt your phone, you need to type a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you power it on. You can't decrypt your phone except by performing a factory data reset, erasing all your data.
Encryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your phone plugged in until encryption is complete. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data."
Charge your battery and try again.
Plug in your charger and try again.
No lock screen PIN or password
You need to set a lock screen PIN or password before you can start encryption.
"The encryption operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you'll lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the phone will restart several times."
Wait while your phone is being encrypted. ^1% complete.

"Encryption was interrupted and can't complete. As a result, the data on your phone is no longer accessible.
To resume using your phone, you need to perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you'll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account."
Change or disable pattern, PIN, or password security
Choose a method to lock the screen
"When Face Unlock can't see you, how do you want to unlock?"
Disabled by administrator, encryption policy, or credential storage
Password must be at least %d characters
PIN must be at least %d digits
Password must be fewer than %d characters.
PIN must be fewer than %d digits.
"Device administrator doesn't allow using a recent PIN."
Password must contain at least one letter.
Password must contain at least one digit.
Password must contain at least one symbol.
"Device administrator doesn't allow using a recent password."

%1$s will be able to read all notifications posted by the system or any installed app, which may include personal information such as contact names and the text of messages sent to you. It will also be able to dismiss these notifications or touch action buttons within them.

"When this feature is turned on, you can beam app content to another NFC-capable device by holding the devices close together. For example, you can beam Browser pages, YouTube videos, People contacts, and more.
Just bring the devices together (typically back to back) and then touch your screen. The app determines what gets beamed."

"Don't use a WLAN network unless it has a good Internet connection"
"Let Google's location service and other apps scan for networks, even when Wi-Fi is off"

"To improve location accuracy and for other purposes, Google and other apps may scan for nearby networks, even when Wi-Fi is off. If you don't want this to happen, go to Advanced > Scanning always available."
"Apps may scan for nearby networks, even when Wi-Fi is off. If you don't want this to happen, go to Advanced > Scanning always available."
There was a problem changing the setting
Minimize battery usage when WLAN is on
To see available networks, turn WLAN on.
"You don't have permission to change the WLAN network."
To complete setup, your tablet needs access to WLAN. After setup, you can switch between mobile data and WLAN.
Press the WLAN Protected Setup button on your router. It may be called \"WPS\" or contain this symbol:
Enter pin %1$s on your WLAN router. The setup can take up to two minutes to complete.
WPS succeeded. Connecting to the network…
WPS is already in progress and can take up to two minutes to complete
WPS failed. Please try again in a few minutes.
The wireless router security setting (WEP) is not supported
The wireless router security setting (TKIP) is not supported
Another WPS session was detected. Please try again in a few minutes.

"To improve location accuracy and for other purposes, %1$s wants to turn on network scanning, even when Wi-Fi is off.
Allow this for all apps that want to scan?"

"WARNING: You may incur extra carrier data charges.
Phone setup can require significant network activity."
"WARNING: Until you have an internet connection, the phone won't be able to verify that your software is up to date."
The phone was unable to connect to this WLAN network.

There was a problem setting the frequency band.

"When this feature is turned on, you can zoom in and out by triple-tapping the screen.
While zoomed in, you can: "
"Pan: Drag two or more fingers across the screen. "
Adjust zoom level: Pinch two or more fingers together or spread them apart."
You can also temporarily magnify what's under your finger by triple-tapping and holding. In this magnified state, you can drag your finger to explore different parts of the screen. Lift your finger to return to your previous state.
Note: Triple-tap for magnification works everywhere except the keyboard and navigation bar."

"When this feature is turned on, you can quickly enable accessibility features in two steps:
Step 1: Press and hold the power button until you hear a sound or feel a vibration.
Step 2: Touch and hold two fingers until you hear audio confirmation.
If the device has multiple users, using this shortcut on the lock screen temporarily enables accessibility until the device is unlocked."
Update screen magnification on app transitions
"Receive notifications when you're interacting with an app."

"This feature may cause an app that depends on background data to stop working when only mobile networks are available.
You can find more appropriate data usage controls in the settings available within the app."
"Restricting background data is possible only when you've set a mobile data limit."

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your phone.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the phone to the web. A Google Account works this way.
To choose which kinds of information to sync within each account, go to Settings > Accounts."
"This will conserve data and battery usage, but you'll need to sync each account manually to collect recent information. And you won't receive notifications when updates occur."

"Your mobile data connection will be disabled when the specified limit is reached.
Since data usage is measured by your phone, and your carrier may account for usage differently, consider using a conservative limit."
"If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won't work unless you're connected to a WLAN network."

"If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won't work unless you're connected to a WLAN network.

Телефон не выберет других операторов за вас в ручном режиме поиска. Иногда, вам нужно вручную выбрать снова или вернуться к режиму автоматического выбора когда пропадает сеть от текущего оператора. Рекомендуем вам использовать \"Автоматический выбор\". Вы хотите изменять оператора вручную?
"Currentlly, there's no service from the selected operator for the \"%s\" SIM card. We recommend that you use the \"Select automatically\", or you can manually select another operator."
"Currentlly, there's no service from the selected operator. We recommend that you use the \"Select automatically\", or you can manually select another operator."
"It's detected that you're making an international call. Please choose your destination."
"It's detected that you're dialing a %s number. Do you want to add the country code (+%s)?"
"It's detected that you are dialing a number in %1$s, %2$s. Do you want to add the country code and the area code (+%3$s)?"
"It's detected that you're dialing from the %s. Change international call prefix to '+'?"
"It's detected that you're dialing a number in %s. If so, please enter the area code."
"It's detected that you're dialing a number in %s. If your destination city is not %s, please enter the area code."
The area code of your destination city is needed for the call.
If your destination city is not %s, please input the area code of your destination city below.
Click the button below to change the country code number.
The number is invalid. Do you want to continue dialing anyway?
Do you want to add the country code and the area code?
You must enable data roaming for this SIM first which may incur significant roaming charges! Are you sure to enable data roaming and select this SIM?

3G service is not available with this selected SIM. This may load data slower. You can change the 3G service setting under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure to select this SIM?

You must enable data roaming for this SIM first which may incur significant roaming charges! Besides, 3G service is not available with this SIM. This may load data slower. You can change it under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure to enable data roaming and select this SIM?
Searching for all available networks will disconnect the data connection which is in use. Do you want to continue?
